ModMetaData.name: [CP] Metal Gear Solid - CQC Takedown
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Remember the basics of CQC. Non-lethal takedown of an opponent.
NOTE: Pawns need to be at least 8 melee to perform a CQC knock-out
WARNING: - Mod is highly unbalanced. This mod has no chance of being polished in terms of balancing because of coding limitations. - Using the ability towards allies will cause zero reactions from them, another coding limitation issue that may be left unfixed.
